As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information or location data. But, there are many street food vendors in and around Jaffna that offer local cuisine, including seafood dishes. Here are some of the popular street food vendors you can check out:

1. Anna Veedu - A street vendor in Jaffna that serves a variety of seafood dishes, including prawn fry and crab masala. 2. Sangu Cafe - Located in Nallur, this street food vendor offers a range of seafood dishes, including cuttlefish fry and fish puttu. 3. Jaffna Downtown Crab Market - Located in Jaffna Town, this street food stall is famous for its Jaffna crab curry, which is cooked in a unique traditional style. 4. Mamulan Ilees Shop - A street food stall located in Mannar, a nearby town to Jaffna, which offers a variety of seafood dishes, including crab masala and fish curry. Keep in mind that street food stalls may have varying levels of food hygiene and safety, so it's essential to exercise caution when choosing where to eat.
